title: It wont let me disenchant champ shards?
body: I just got a karma champs hard from a chest(already owned) and I have a Camille champ shard(who I want) but when trying to disenchant karma i left click the shard and nothing shows up.

replies.body: I do see Karma shard in your inventory, so it doesn't look like anything has processed or been lost.  You could be having a connection issue failing to reach hextech and process your transaction.  Give your client a restart just in case.  If it persists, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help.
